definitions.text: a kind of pain; something as sudden and painful as being stung
examples: he felt the stinging of nettles

definitions.text: cause a sharp or stinging pain or discomfort

examples: A bee stung my arm yesterday

definitions.text: saddle with something disagreeable or disadvantageous
examples: They stuck me with the dinner bill
I was stung with a huge tax bill

definitions.text: cause an emotional pain, as if by stinging
(of speech) harsh or hurtful in tone or character
